summary: Only use reads belonging to a specific sample

arguments.summary: The name of the sample(s) to keep, filtering out all others
arguments.name: --sample_to_keep

description:
This filter is useful for isolating data from one particular sample in a multisample file.

Usage example

Use only reads from the sample named NA12878

     java -jar GenomeAnalysisTk.jar \
         -T ToolName \
         -R reference.fasta \
         -I input.bam \
         -o output.file \
         -rf Sample \
         -goodSM NA12878
name: SampleFilter
